text: Kare-ra wa moji o shiranai yogen-sha, shito ni tsuisho suru mono-tachidearu. Kare hakare-ra no motte iru (Keisuke) rippo to fukuin no naka ni, shirusa re miidasa reru monodearu. Kare wa seigi o kare-ra ni meiji, jaaku o kare-ra ni kinjiru. Mata issai no yoi (kiyoi) mono o goho 〔hararu〕 to nashi, warui (kegareta) mono o kinki 〔haramu〕 to suru. Mata kare-ra no omoni o nozoki, kare-ra no ue no sokubaku o hodoku. Sore de kare (shito) o shinjiru mono wa, kare o sonkei shi, kare o tasukete, kare to tomoni kudasa reta o hikari ni shitagau. Korera no hitobito koso wa seiko suru mono-tachidearu
